text: "Last Night" is the third single off of American country singer Morgan Wallen's third studio album One Thing at a Time. The song was released on February 6, 2023. The song was able to make it to #1 on both the Billboard Hot 100 and Billboard Hot Country Songs. The song is about a couple getting drunk, having an argument and dealing with the aftermath. While she wants the relationship to end, he wants to try and keep it together. In July 2023, it was the first song to get 1 billion on-demand streams in the United States in a year. == Charts == ===Weekly charts=== Chart performance for "Last Night" Chart (2023) Peak position Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 1 US Billboard Hot 100 1 US Hot Country Songs (Billboard) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2023) Peak position Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 3 US Billboard Hot 100 1 US Hot Country Songs (Billboard) 1 ==References== ==Other websites== *"Last Night" on YouTube Category:2023 songs Category:Country ballads
title: Last Night (song)
